dcterms:description: The MIMIC-III database contains de-identified data from 58,976 ICU patient admissions, which includes several types of medical information such as demographics, medications, clinical notes, and more.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III v1.4

dcterms:description: MedLane is a new human-annotated dataset for translating professional medical sentences into layperson-understandable language, containing 12,801 training samples, 1,015 validation samples, and 1,016 testing samples.
dcterms:title: MedLane

dcterms:description: The National NLP Clinical Challenges (n2c2) dataset provides unstructured notes from the Research Patient Data Repository at Partners Healthcare System in Boston, covering various clinical NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: National NLP Clinical Challenges (n2c2)

dcterms:description: The UFAL Medical Corpus is a dataset that contains medical texts, but specific details about its content and structure are not provided in the paper.
dcterms:title: UFAL Medical Corpus v.1.0
